This document is to help decide on an analytic dataset. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
raw_lyme = read_csv("./nyc_lyme.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select( -crude_rate_per_1_000_live_births,-crude_rate_per_100_000_population,-age_adjusted_rate_per_100_000_population, -disease) %>% 
  filter(yearnum %in% 2015:2022) 

tick_surveillance = read_csv("./Deer_Tick_Surveillance__Adults__Oct_to_Dec__excluding_Powassan_virus__Beginning_2008_20241116.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

ny_county =  st_read("./Counties.shp") 

```
